data.message: Not watching tonight, or buying any of your new CDs you went to far disrespecting OUR president.  I hope your CD doesn't sell well. Screw you Eminem you wigger! 🖕🖕

replies.message: Dude this isn't his first time dissing presidents. Try listening to Mosh and White America
^Butthurt trump supporter here
Billy Ray Valentine Believe me I'm not butt hurt at all. I'm kind of glad i'm not a Eminem fan anymore, Because I have an awesome president. #TrumpIsMyPresident
Lewis Bottoms lol
Sure we do.......  can you really say that and believe it?
Justin Beeman yes I can
Justin Beeman i'm not like you butt hurt Hillary supporters
We sure will see how awesome that President is when he’s impeached and in jail for accepting money from Russia. Oh yes, we sure will see. And you will still be broke.
James Richard I know but it's his first time saying F you to his fans! Which isn't cool!!!
Billy Ray Valentine he won't be impeached because he didn't do nothing wrong. The Clinton foundation was involved with Russia not trump. Stop listening to fake news
Billy Ray Valentine you can't impeach him just because you don't like him. 😒
But you will still be broke, paying more in taxes, while you watch your awesome president getting YUGE tax cuts flying in his private jet, grabbing females by the p*ssy.
Billy Ray Valentine you:"oh he said this, and he said that. He said really mean things. We should impeach him." Ha!! Give me a break. You can't impeach somebody because he hurt your feelings. Moron
Ohh kuzz u hang out wit trump like that? Know all his little details and what the fuck he does every minute of everyday, cmon kid grow up
Rob RW Gum I never said that I knew every little detail moron

But is he benefitting you in what way? Are you receiving a giant tax break? No. Are you seeing the murder rate decrease? No. Are you seeing the national debt go down? Not at all. But you are seeing Donald Trump getting richer and richer and richer while you stay broke.
Billy Ray Valentine if you can't do everything in one year. And btw, it's  the left that are killing people, all Hillary supporters
What benefit are you getting from him being the president? Absolutely nothing.
He’s not putting more money in your pocket. He’s gonna be taking more money out of your pocket real soon though.
Billy Ray Valentine you don't know that. you don't know me or my life.
You don’t have any benefit coming your way. Guaranteed.
Billy Ray Valentine again, he can't do everything in one year. End of conversation.
^zero benefits coming this guys way because Trump is president.
Hey fuck you dude Eminem is more amazing than you could ever be hating is for fucked up people like yourself.
Jenn Bender no, screw you.
